title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: After creating two projects P1 and P2, when I select P2 and try to close it, the 'Close project' option is not available.
EB: Either both 'Open project' and 'Close project' options should be available for both projects or neither should be enabled for either project.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Create two projects, P1 and P2.
2. Select project P2.
3. Attempt to close project P2 and observe that the 'Close project' option is not available.
